page.title: 05A WHALSAY WEDDING 2/2
page.content: In the middle of the wedding the bride and groom go out visiting the old folk who can't come to the hall. Through the evening whisky,beer,vodka and sherry are served to all guests who want it. At the end of the wedding they toss the bride and groom and sing 2 or 3 songs. On the second night they either have a disco at the hall or go to the bride and grooms parents house where the celebrations continue. A Whalsay wedding may cost Â£2-4000 but many guests give presents of money which help to pay for it.
